website_summaries.verdict: This one-size-fits-most band is designed for daily wear and helps correct posture problems caused by changing center of gravity.
pros: Helps relieve hip, pelvic, and sacroiliac pain and minimize spinal strain
One size fits most, up to 48 inches
Supports back without being too constrictive
Gives a lot of room for adjustment
cons: May not fit larger customers or customers in the last weeks of pregnancy

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in today and I must say it is pure relief. I am currently 29 weeks with baby number 5 and have lots of round ligament issues and back issues I see the chiropractor for. This helps me to lift my rather large belly and stay comfy for when I need to be active and on my feet a lot. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for round ligament pain and support
customer_reviews.text: This has been helpful for supporting my hips during my second pregnancy. I am experiencing round ligament pain, and I notice my body feels better and haven’t strained any muscles while I wear this band. I make sure to use it when I’m on my feet for long periods of time, on walks, during yoga, cleaning, or at the grocery, and the support really helps. For added support and to hide the band, I tie a pretty scarf around my waste below my belly. This combo has been so helpful during my last trimester. I also like how easy it is to take on and off, especially because I don’t love to sit down while wearing this band.
customer_reviews.author: JennyJenMo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend
customer_reviews.text: If your going to be up on your feet working most of your pregnancy I highly recommend. I'm 6 months and it's helped relieve lower back and hip pain and I've noticed my feet aren't as sore as before either. It helps a lot with posture and holding everything up. My obgyn actually referred me to looking into one because others have swore by it and this one had good reviews. It was definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jacy Burdine

customer_reviews.title: Its very comfortable, easy to put on/take off (hello frequent bathroom ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and it shipped promptly and arrived within prime shipping. Its been a HUGE help as I work in the wedding industry and often spend a lot of time on my feet. Its very comfortable, easy to put on/take off (hello frequent bathroom breaks!). Its not bulky and conceals well under a light layer of clothing. I haven't used it directly against my skin, so I don't know if its comfortable in that way, I've always had a layer from maternity pants, etc inbetween, but it doesn't ride up or slip down. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter as she is petite and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as she is petite and being 7 months pregnant...she was having tummy issues as to stretching and heaviness. This belt did the trick, it relieved the pressure and stretching issues due to the fact it supported the tummy ...
customer_reviews.author: ADRIENNE

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This brace helps so much with my hip pain!! I forgot to put it on at the airport and my hip was killing me so even though I was a little embarrassed I pulled it out and put it on over my clothes and my hip instantly felt like 100 times better. Makes a huge difference!
customer_reviews.author: Clarichatts

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I'm on my third baby and I've been really struggling with lower back pain and just overall belly discomfort. I wasnt sure how much this was really helping until I didn't wear it for a day. I was miserable! My back and belly were in pain. I wish it was a big thinner as you can see the edges through my shirt, even when wearing multiple layers. But comfort is more important to me right now!
customer_reviews.author: sweetfreedom

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give 6 stars! A must buy
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is this is the best purchase I have made during the entire pregnancy. Ladies I have no more back pain and this belt some how makes the weight of my belly a no factor. I walk faster and I'm comfortable through out my entire day. So many people women/men have asked me about and I can't stop raving about it. I wish I bought it my first pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: BEST Maternity belt
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter because she is a very small framed woman and she has to stand at her job all day. She absolutely loves this belt. It relieved her back pain she experienced. We are very happy. Thanks so much for FAST shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Tnesmith

customer_reviews.title: HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: One day my pelvis started to hurt to the point i'm afraid to walk. I was at 34 weeks and my OBGYN told me it's normal. I bought this asap here in Amazon and had same day shipping and it helps me with my current pain. It cannot remove the pain obviously but the pain is more tolerable now especially here at work. I don't wear this to sleep, i wear another belly aupport for that. But this is a good buy for me. I'm 5'1" and currently 167lbs and the adjustable strap/velcro allows me to adjust the tightness or snugness of the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: I love this maternity belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this maternity belt. It has helped me so much. I am pregnant with my second child and felt like my belly grew very fast. Now when I forget to put the belt on I realize just how much it is helping me. It is comfortable and I have had no problems with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this belt. It is comfortable to wear when standing or walking (not so much when sitting, but in my case at least I didn't really need the support when sitting). I think it has helped to ease my round ligament pain a bit and makes my back feel a bit more supported without being too constrictive and tight. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Not lots of straps and gives the back and tummy support needed during pregnancy. I bought this product at 5 months in utero and used through the remainder of the pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been wearing this for one full day and I can already tell a huge difference in the relief of my back. I’m 8 months pregnant and have been babysitting an 18 month all day, and haven’t noticed any pain in my lower back. The belt was super easy to put on and I have not had to adjust it once today. It stayed in place perfectly and best of all, hasn’t been uncomfortable or made me sweat. I based my size on my measurement, and the fact that I will get bigger and I am happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Buy one.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and 7 months pregnant at around 174ish walrussy, waddling pounds. The large fits wonderfully and will last me the rest of my pregnancy. My midwife told me to buy a belt for support due to dilation and funneling since 26 weeks. I'm also on bedrest which is hard on your hips and lower back. This helps a lot. I don't sleep in it, I just wear it around the house during the day to help reverse some of the gravitational force I have going on. The physics are strong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: and am so much more comfortable, and am able to do a lot more ...
customer_reviews.text: 7 months pregnant and have been miserable doing day to day tasks, walking around, sleeping, and getting out of bed. I have had this for about a week now, and am so much more comfortable, and am able to do a lot more things that I was beginning to have trouble with because of how heavy my belly is getting. The fabric is comfortable, and the Velcro holds well so I can sleep with it on, and wear it all day. I would definitely recommend, I wish I would have looked into this a lot sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: YES! Yes! Relief!!
customer_reviews.text: My back was hurting so bad at the end of my work day (im a preschool teacher) and my belly would feel so heavy and i didnt even want to walk... the first day i wore this maternity band i got home after work and it was the first time i didnt say "ugh i need a nice long epsom bath" i felt great!!! Wish i had gotten it for my other pregnancies!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Macedo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for belly lift!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance on this belt and it was great! I needed something to "lift" the belly a little as the one I already had from my first pregnancy didn't quite do it. Very breathable, very light and very easy to use. I would definitely recommend this. I got it at the start of my third trimester and it's working out great!
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Stabs you with plastic pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and great at first...... then after a week it started falling apart and I was being stabbed by little plastic pieces or whatever this thing is woven with. Its garbage. I was so happy with it but I refuse to wear it anymore because it stabs me with these tiny hair like plastic bits that are broken and poking out throught the entire belt. It was not laundered or anything and was loosely rolled/folded when I wasnt using it. So not sure what caused it. Definitely not happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kisstin Edge

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, relieved side/back pain
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended I get a maternity belt after I complained of persistent side/rib pain. This belt helps a lot. Pros: - Velcro is adjustable all the way around, not just at the ends of the belt. - Belt it wider at the tummy giving nice support where it is needed most. - Easy to use and stretch Cons: - Little bits of plastic (presumably from the Velcro) poke out and then poke your skin even through fabric/clothing. Over all a great belt and have already recommended it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: supportive
customer_reviews.text: I am 7 months pregnant and teach first grade, so am on my feet a lot. I ordered this after reading the reviews. I wore it for the first time today and have to say that I was impressed. It was lightweight and did not make me too hot. I wore it under my shirt (over my maternity pants) and it was pretty comfortable. The velcro does not seem too strong, not sure how long it will last but it did not come undone once today.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied in Ga.

customer_reviews.title: Not much support
customer_reviews.text: I am 8 months pregnant and my belly has started to hurt really bad, feels like it’s going to rip off my torso! When I received this belt I immediately tried it on and struggled. As a bigger girl, size 18 I knew there wasn’t a lot of room for me to grow, it struggled to go around me. Upon having it on I could tell immediately there was zero support for my belly. Just felt like a fashion belt, an extra annoying layer of clothes. I returned it, and am hoping to find a different style of band that provides more support.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan silva

customer_reviews.title: Relief for tired back and hips
customer_reviews.text: This belt has provided so much relief for my tired back and hips. I'm in my 3rd trimester and have been wearing this belt for several weeks now. I work mostly sitting and have found that my posture is better and my back is not as tired at the end of the day. I only take it off about an hour before I go to bed it helps so much. I also wear it on the weekends when I'm up doing things around my house, it's very comfortable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Brady

customer_reviews.title: Helps support the belly.
customer_reviews.text: I wore this while packing boxes and it does seem to help reduce back strain. I'm 6 mo. along and have a sizable bump and was getting pretty regular back pain from leaning over. It is easy to put on, and relatively low profile, so it can be hidden beneath a loose shirt. The only problem is that it can feel pretty constrictive, so I wouldn't wear it all day unless I had to do manual labor all day.
customer_reviews.author: FzzPoofy

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great support. I do wear it with something underneath as others have mentioned that it is not always comfortable on bare skin. It did take a few hours to get used to the feel but I couldn't be without it now. I wish I had this in my previous pregnancies! I don't know what took me so long to get one. I especially love that it had the support bars in the back to help maintain proper curvature in the spine. Most pregnant women tend to slump that which is why back and pelvic pain is so common.
customer_reviews.author: D.H.B.

customer_reviews.title: I’m really happy I purchased this maternity belt
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy I purchased this maternity belt! It has helped me tremendously! I’m a nurse and I work really long hours, on my feet all day walking & bending. This belt really helps support by back and lower abdomen, and definitely makes it easier with bending. It does have a tendency to ride up on my abdomen, and I frequently have to readjust it. That could just be related to the fact that I don’t like to wear the belt too tight though. It really has made a huge difference in my back pain! Wish I would have purchased sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Earle

customer_reviews.title: Great belly support!
customer_reviews.text: This combined with the flexible belly bands has made my pregnancy so much more comfortable! I've had a lot of ab muscle pain during my 3rd trimester, and this band makes a significant difference. I wear it to workout, go shopping, clean, etc. It's worth noting that (in my experience) it's more comfortable and useful to wear on days when I'm up walking around a lot. If I'm sitting at my desk all day it tends to put a lot of pressure lower on my abdomen, and I end up taking it off. Even with that said, I love this band.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for hip/ back pain during pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad I purchased this belt. I am currently 35 weeks pregnant and have suffered with my hips and back since about 25 weeks. This belt helps eleviate some of the pressure that is put on my hips and back and makes the day much more tolerable! I just wish I would have gotten it earlier in my pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Shantelle James

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how or why it works, but it provides instant relief!
customer_reviews.text: My second pregnancy has been a lot harder on my innards and for weeks now it has felt like the baby was trying to make his escape (way early and absolutely not really what is going on)every time I stood for any length of time. I mentioned it to my doc and she suggested one of these and wow if it doesn't instantly take away that sensation.
customer_reviews.author: BJM

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I'm just into my third trimester and I've started to have low muscle pain now that baby is pushing outward more. Mostly I use it at work since I'm on my feet a lot and so far it's helped. It's not super thin so it can be seen through clothing, but relief is more important than appearance at this point! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I haven't had too much use for it yet, but I'm sure that'll change quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price was also a good value. I wear this to walk to to ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews although I read them all the time. I am a big fan of this belt. Bought when severe round ligament pain struck at 25 weeks, wearing this on a consistent basis has really helped me manage the pain by putting less pressure on the ligaments and keeping my belly lifted. The price was also a good value. I wear this to walk to to the train from my office in the Texas summer heat and it does breathe very well. If you are in pain like I was I would definitely recommend trying it before resorting to more expensive measures or drugs.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: I like the size and fit of this belt
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and fit of this belt, it works well for me. Its not as bulky as some of the others and I can wear it earlier in pregnancy bc even a small bump will keep it from sliding up. I am 5'6" and normally a size 12 pants, this belt fits now with plenty of room to grow. However, if I was a size 2, I would be wrapping this thing around twice, even in the 3rd trimester.
customer_reviews.author: Skier

customer_reviews.title: Material is super uncomfortable. You will not be able to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Material is super uncomfortable. You will not be able to wear this against your skin. Also, if you are smaller framed and a "smaller" pregnant woman, this probably will not fit you well. I am small and it was much to big. It fit odd and didn't offer any support for me. It basically just covered my entire belly and felt awkward. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Pipes33

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT !!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter n law is 6 months pregnant and looked miserable. Her belly looked so uncomfortable. I bought this for her, she put it on as soon as we received it, it lifted her belly up so her back wasn't being pulled on so much. Now she won't go without it. She says you can't even feel it on. She even walks and sits better. This company was so AWESOME with us !! They will stay in contact with you all the way and even after you receive it to make sure you are completely satisfied. ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a relief...
customer_reviews.text: I have a petite frame (5’1”) and this band not only fits me perfectly, but also provides good support! The moment I put it on, I could feel the relief. I can do anything (sit, stand, walk around) and it feels comfortable and doesn’t roll or anything else. It is totally adjustable and breathable. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Twin Pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this maternity belt! Bought it at about 20ish weeks for my twin pregnancy and now at 31 weeks I almost never take it off. Helps a ton with lower back pain and supporting my belly. It’s a little scratchy to wear underneath clothes- but I put it over my shirt/pants/dresses and feels amazing. Also helps me with a lot with longer car rides love the mesh as well- keeps it from feeling too hot. Well worth every penny and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Stick

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and worked wonders. I was having a lot of trouble getting/walking around towards the end of my second pregnancy. The doctor recommend a maternity belt. So I found and purchased this one. It helped tremendously. I have a bad back to start with so the weight of the baby was really pulling on me. I was a little worried about the fit because I am bigger in the midsection, but it fit perfect and I had lots of belt to spare. My sister is currently pregnant with her first and the baby is big so I passed it on to her 😁
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: The belt came pretty quick and it’s eveything it was described on the description. I’m going into my 9 month and it supports my back so well and relives the back pain when I have to stand for a few hours. I think the only thing that prevented me from giving it a 5 star is that the material makes my belly itch (even wearing a shirt underneath it). I would recommend this product though :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathster83

customer_reviews.title: Love the materials and functionality of the belt, but it runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: it's comfortable and helps relieve my backpain. the only reason i'm giving a 4 instead of a 5 star is 'cos my belly has gotten so big that the upper strap wouldn't fit any more. it's my first pregnancy and people have told me I'm BIG, but i'm a petite Asian, so I'd imagine a lot of women may outgrow the belt easily
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhh some comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Love this belt. It’s comfortable I wear it under my clothing and you can’t even see it. It does help a lot with holding up my stomach better giving me some relief. It does nothing for back pain though and nothing for pelvic pain that I experience. That’s why I bought it. But either way it is making a difference in my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqulyn F.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was having very severe pelvic girdle pain at about 31 weeks pregnant. Getting in and out of the car, lifting my toddler, walking, rolling in bed -- all were extremely painful in my groin and hip. I was skeptical that something as simple as this could help but it did! In fact, it made the pain go away completely after 4 days of continuous wear. Amazing. Don't hesitate, $20 is nothing for your comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Olmeda

customer_reviews.title: I really love the belt
customer_reviews.text: I really love the belt, offers great support. Only complaint is it does seem to slip down a little throughout the day. I just adjust it back to where I want it when I use the bathroom. Belt is comfortable also. I know some reviews had mentioned it being itchy, I can wear it directly on my belly with no problems. Great buybfor the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a great maternity belt. I was having extreme round liagement pain. The doctor recommended I purchase one, so I did, nothing else helped. I don't have any pain when I'm wearing it. It really supports the belly. I was nervous when buying due to I'm only 5.5 Month pregnant and 215 lbs. all the pictures has very small women in them. I didn't think it would fit. To my surprise it fits with more room to grow as well. I would recommend to all my pregnant friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Will use again but will purchase new one as this one bent some
customer_reviews.text: I've used it starting my second trimester and it helped greatly. I was under 100 pounds pre-pregnancy, so my belly popped a bit earlier :). Now at the end of 3rd trimester I don't feel like I'm getting the same support as before, but it worked perfectly for about 4 months and I had no back-pains and felt no pressure while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: It works great to support my belly and it's not too tight ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered at 30 weeks when I was starting to feel ligament pain around my hips. It works great to support my belly and it's not too tight or all that noticeable that I am wearing it. It does help with the pain. I only wear it for a few hours a day, I don't think you're suppose to keep them on all day.
customer_reviews.author: JRinATX

customer_reviews.title: CAUSED lower back pain! Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This actually caused back pain for me because it pulls on your lower back to try & hold up your belly. I tried for a week thinking it may get better but it only got worse & I’d feel relief whenever I took it off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and is pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use and is pretty comfortable. I am still pretty early on, but I know it will be an everyday accessory when my belly pops!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Works good!
customer_reviews.text: This has definitely been helping my back not hurt as much. I got the XL, and I'm only 13 weeks, but I carry all my excess weight in my gut so as soon as I was pregnant my back was killing me. The straps move around a bit while I'm at work, even with a tank top on underneath. I have an active bending/moving job so I think that is mostly the reasoning. Hoping it expands well as I get further into the pregnancy!
customer_reviews.author: AmberP23

customer_reviews.title: almost like an ace bandage
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a low profile maternity belt to wear to work under my clothes. This belt is quite thin, almost like an ace bandage, but still provides a good amount of support. I wear it over and under shirt for comfort as well. This is exactly what I was looking for, but if you want more support, perhaps one of the over shoulder options would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Cray

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, Comfortable, & Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with choosing this belt out of all the choices on Amazon! It can be a little tricky to put on & get tight by yourself but I've finally got it down. I can definitely feel the support and its really comfortable to wear all day. The Velcro makes is super adjustable so it won't be too big or small on any body type. I haven't had much trouble at all with it showing through my clothing since it sits pretty smooth. Great belt and happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Since im still working and having to be on my feet this belt is great. Iv warn it off and on b/c i have forgotten to put it on some days, but you can tell the difference when its off. The material is great and it is a one size fit all kinda belt. Its something you should try for your selves and dont just go by ths reviews read, including this one. Buy it try in if you dont like it return it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Reduced my pain
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Product as pictured. And it has HELPED! That's what is most important. The top part of my stomach would hurt by the end of the day as if my belly was too heavy and my skin was about to tear open from holding it up all day. With help of the belt, it has reduced my pain. The Velcro design works well for any size woman.
customer_reviews.author: ABuzzell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So great!! This provided the support for my lower stomach and lower back. I wear it extra tight when walking and I feel fully supported. I have a tender spot on my belly and put it around the middle of my stomach, not super tight, while I'm sitting or laying down. It compresses that tender spot and doesn't hurt anymore, at all. I will be wearing this everyday for the rest of my pregnancy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She said it helped her a lot with great support, it was comfortable and her feet did ...
customer_reviews.text: It really helped my wife. She said it helped her a lot with great support, it was comfortable and her feet did not swell and/or hurt as much. The only Down side was the velcro. After only a couple months it came off. All the benefits outweighed the negatives and my wife wants another. As the saying goes, “Happy wife, happy life!”. If you could send a slice of cheesecake that would be great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Magnos Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had started using this bellyband earlier in my pregnancy! I started to get really uncomfortable and couldn’t sleep through the night due to my lower back pain. Within a few days of wearing this belly band at the office all day, I was sleeping so much more soundly at night. And we know how desperately sleep is needed during pregnancy so this purchase has been a game changer for me!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kornman

customer_reviews.title: Great belly band
customer_reviews.text: This is the best belly belt I have owned. It adjust to any size. It holds my belly well. Before I could not walk around for more than 10 mins on my feet. Now I have no issues. I am at 6 months now and have a pretty big belly. Excellent. Quality is good also, does not feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Alleycat

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: this support belt does relieve my pelvic pain during walking from pregnancy. its lightweight and stretchable. its a bit uncomfortable to have it on while sitting but that is just me. i just take it off everytime im sitting for a long time. i wear this over my pregnancy legging because i dont like how it rubs against my skin, a bit itchy. Overall, it's a good support belt for any pregnant ladies out there with pelvic pain
customer_reviews.author: DuyHung Tran

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my SPD/PGP pain this pregnancy. Makes it hurt less to walk. It came on time and was packaged nicely. It's breathable fabric and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but does ride up some
customer_reviews.text: This belt is easy to wear all day and pretty comfortable. It provides decent support, although you don’t feel a noticeable lifting that you do with other belts. It isn’t as stiff as others, making it much easier to sit in. I would recommend wearing an undershirt with it because it can be a little itchy on bare skin. Over all I am happy with the purchase and have worn it everyday for a week. I have noticed that the lower part of the belt does ride up some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s really itchy if you do t use an under ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s really itchy if you do t use an under shirt. It’s really hot if you use an under shirt. It does help with back support but I’m not sure how often I really use it. I’ve gained 37 pounds with this pregnancy and it is more uncomfortable than it is helpful for me
customer_reviews.author: tu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you are pregnant and working on your feet! Being a hairstylist requires me to stand on my feet the whole time I'm am working. This was a lifesaver for my back and the weight in front . I Worked up till the day I delivered my son and I don't know what I would have done without this! I highly recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The pregnant amongst us will like this product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my pregnant wife at 24 weeks. As a registered nurse, she uses it for her 12-hour shifts at the hospital. It helps with her back pain. She wears it every shift, so it must be working.
customer_reviews.author: Lando Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for he first two days
customer_reviews.text: The first two days it worked amazingly! My pelvic pain was gone and I could actually get my pants on without help or pain! Then it started rolling under my baby bump and I haven’t been able to get it to stop. It stays put for about a minute before just rolling up and it is really uncomfortable so it’s a huge bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Jolly

customer_reviews.title: This was my bestfriend
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of back/pelvic pin during pregnancy. This was my best friend during my third trimester it alleviated that pain. When i was aching i would pop it on for a few hours and when i took the off the pain would go away for majority of the day until i needed to pop back on for support. I did not sleep with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Velcro isn’t great.
customer_reviews.text: Initially this product offered great support but with one wash and everyday use the Velcro doesn’t hold as well and give the same amount of support. Im disappointed because I wanted and so desperately needed this product to work but if it doesn’t last till the end of my pregnancy it’s not the product for me :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Been suffering from back and pelvic pain for the past month. Bought this belt in hopes of a miracle. No miracle came while wearing the belt however it does take the edge off
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: where have I been until now?
customer_reviews.text: It's my first day wearing it and first time trying something like this and all I can say is where was I until now? I've been feeling like my hips are coming apart and now it's like someone put them together again! I love the hard pressure on my back. It's like a constant portable massage.
customer_reviews.author: Goldy

customer_reviews.title: I like to run
customer_reviews.text: This support band is well made, but it's not made for higher impact workouts while pregnant. I like to run, and did so thru almost my whole pregnancy (doctor approved), but because it only has one velcro closure, I never felt like I could keep it tight enough. It felt like it would get bigger on me while I worked out. I ended up getting a different belt that I felt like gave me more support.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to work but unfortunately it’s not ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work but unfortunately it’s not for me. The hard bracing in the back is too long, making it incredibly uncomfortable to sit down, leading to more back pain. I’m up and down constantly at work so taking it off every time I sit isn’t an option. It does work well when standing and helps my posture but I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: vikki

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and offers great relief
customer_reviews.text: This belt worked so well for me and that I bought a second one for a friend! Highly recommend to get you through those tough days of back pain. I also preferred to wear it overnight to ease the pressure off my bladder and it definitely helped!
customer_reviews.author: Althea

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am 6 months pregnant and just getting to the point where I have low back pain especially when walking. I could not believe how much this helped! I am so glad a friend suggested I buy it!
customer_reviews.author: E.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this belt to others
customer_reviews.text: Received the product very quickly. I have been using it for a few days and I can really tell a difference in my lower back and pelvic pain. I would definitely recommend this belt to others.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this maternity belt. It really wasn't that durable, so I did not get that much support from it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, folds often/doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to stay comfortable for long wearing this pregancy brace. It slides whether you wear it over clothing or directly on your skin. I made sure I bought the size that correseponded with my measurements but only got a couple wears out of it before giving up because it wouldn't stay and it folding up was uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla G

customer_reviews.title: The belt arrived on time without delays and I just want to say it's very comfortable and the material it's made out of is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this belt because I was having round ligament pain but it went away before I could put this belt to use, I tried it on today and I don't have a big belly so no back pain yet but I'm sure it will come in very handy later on. The belt arrived on time without delays and I just want to say it's very comfortable and the material it's made out of is very soft on the skin also it seems like it would hold up pretty good throughout the day as the material where the belly portion sits is breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I’m small in size (5’1 112lbs at 32w pregnant) and this belt fit me perfectly! I’ve been using it daily due to back/hip pain and have found relief which is great considering I’m chasing my toddler around most of the day. Obviously everyone is different and will have their own experiences but I would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Y. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Won't last long
customer_reviews.text: This back brace worked GREAT....for about 3 weeks! After that the fabric wouldn't hold the velcro anymore and it kept coming off. I really liked it until it proved to be made of low quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: Ok for early pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Support wasn't the best. The velcro wore out quickly. Ok for pain relief in early pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: I am at 22 weeks now and this has made a positive difference for me in that it allows me to stay comfortable while sitting and walking. It helps keep your belly up so things don't feel like they're just hanging. I think I will get a good amount of use out of this belt!
customer_reviews.author: greenteas

customer_reviews.title: For my nurses & ladies on their feet: this is a must!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!! I’m 22 weeks pregnant and I swear by this when I have to work! I am a Registered Nurse & I work 12 hour shifts on my feet, all day! I had the worse sciatica and I could barely walk, I was not sure how I would be able to work up until my due date. So I decided to give the brace a try & OMG it’s a lifesaver! It’s a must have for you ladies who need support & pain relief!
customer_reviews.author: Brit2lovely

customer_reviews.title: Not for all day heavy use
customer_reviews.text: This product only held up for a week. I am a nurse and could not handle all day where. I replaced the Velcro and it still was not able to stand up.
customer_reviews.author: beoutsidelive

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable and not a ton of support
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable and not a ton of support. It also runs a little small, I'm usually a size 15 but was an 18 in my pregnancy, lots of days I took this off because it squeezed my growing belly. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely in love with this maternity belt
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this maternity belt! I am a housekeeper and therefore am on my feet all day. This pregnancy (my second) has been going smoothly but recently I have been experiencing hip/lower back pain after longer days at work. This arrived yesterday and when I put it on at work I immediately noticed a difference. The second part of my day has been harder (pain/discomfort wise) but today it was like pre-pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best investment!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is probably one of the best investments I've made my whole pregnancy. Originally didn't see the point of having a support belt, but once I started getting further along in my pregnancy and how much my back was hurting, this belt provides so much support and best part is that you can't even tell I'm wearing it most of the time because I wear it under my uniform
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I was able to walk so much better with this belt
customer_reviews.text: Game changer. I was able to walk so much better with this belt. I wore from 30 weeks on and saved me from a lot of pain!
customer_reviews.author: SRPCARL

customer_reviews.title: Good for standing.
customer_reviews.text: This belt seems to be helping my daughter with the stress she is feeling in both her pelvis and back. She finds it hard to get up and down a lot in and with a 10 month old that is key. But for standing a work it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover 93940

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the first belt ive ever bought that was actually comfortable on my skin and not itchy!
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved my life during my last pregnancy. I had really bad pelvic pain and the only way I got through the work day was by wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: This belly band has made activity into my 2nd and 3rd trimester possible! I am 5'5" and 140 pounds - pregnant with twins. My belly weight was starting to put too much weight on my back by 4 months. This simple band has made it possible to run errands and not be in pain!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great pain relief, but you’ll need more than one
customer_reviews.text: Loved this belt - very supportive and when worn all day (before soreness starts) it relieved just about all of my belly and back pain. Sadly, it does NOT last - I got two months (of all day daily wear!) out of it before the velcro gave out and I had to wear a belly band over it to keep it secure (I didn’t want to buy another one with only a month to go). Price is right though so maybe just buy two. It’s also rather discreet, so that’s a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: mandc

customer_reviews.title: Good belt just like description
customer_reviews.text: The belt is a very adjustable and the Velcro holds really well. It is comfortable to wear all day but can be uncomfortable when sitting for long periods or driving. I really feel like it supports my growing belly.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Great belly belt!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never used a belly belt before so I don't have much to compare to. However this is my third pregnancy and it has been one with many complications. One of the smaller ones was the severe back pain from the weight of the belly. This belt helped literally the second I put it on! Instant relief, even going to the bathroom was difficult but not with the belt. I love this belt so much and will definitely recommend it to my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: My wife uses the support during the night to go ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses the support during the night to go sleep and during the day. The support has eliminated her back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Fco

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who was feeling pressure due to her growing tummy. She’s only about 5 months and I’m glad this belt will expand as she will. She says it’s comfy and it’s helping. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! After just trying on my belt, I can feel the difference in weight dustribution in the front and support in the back! I already feel better in my lower abdomen where my growing bump has been pulling on my muscles the past few weeks. I think this belt will really help in the coming months as I get closer to my due date. At first I was worried about there only being two sizes, but fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Lostapixie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the material is not really good. It's not easy as similar maternity belts. Price is good but would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tural Mehdiyev

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 different maternity supports & this was my favorite. I felt much more support with this one because it has what I believe is plastic in the back of it which made me feel more supported & helped keep it from rolling down. The Velcro was also very sturdy and very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable maternity belt
customer_reviews.text: I was in great need for a maternity belt. My home nurse recommend I try this brand and I absolutely love it! With Amazon Prime, the order was here in a matter of a couple of days. Baymax Assistant Products followed up with me to make sure I received it, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Best support
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt, I felt instant support. The belt it stretchy so it will stretch to fit and you can flip the belt to have the velcro on either side you prefer.... its comfortable but I haven't wore it one bare skin so I would suggest over clothing.
customer_reviews.author: jilly1357

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was having her baby being really low n giving her back issues too. But no more n she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Mae

product_meta.title: Maternity Belt,Lower Back and Pelvic Support - Belly Band for Pregnancy,Nude
feature_bullets: RELIEVES PAIN:Helping you get relief from hip, pelvic and sacroiliac pain, while further minimizing spinal strain, It is a great way to correct posture and support weak abdominal muscles during your pregnancy

COMFORTABLE: Designed to be worn daily during your day to day activities, you do not have to limit your abilities while wearing this pregnancy brace. It is made of a soft breathable material which can be comfortably worn under any clothing

SMALL,MEDIUM OR LARGE SIZE?: The elastic material allows the belt to stretch to your desired size,no need to worry about size any more,one size fit all（UP TO 48 Inch）,You will be able to wear this belly brace throughout your entire pregnancy
GUARANTEE: This soft maternity belt comes with a 100% Money Back Guarantee
Ideal for correcting poor posture and supporting weak abdominal muscles during pregnancy
